tool_description: Aligns transcribed words with precise timestamps from the original audio, providing word-level timing information for synchronized playback and navigation.

transcription_text.description: Transcribed text to align with timestamps

audio_segment_id.description: Audio segment identifier used for transcription

segment_start_time.description: Start timestamp of the audio segment

force_alignment.description: Force alignment even with low confidence

error_messages: Empty transcription: Provide non-empty transcription_text for alignment.
Invalid audio segment: Provide a valid audio_segment_id.
Invalid timestamp: segment_start_time must be a valid ISO 8601 datetime string.
Invalid precision: alignment_precision must be 'word', 'phrase', or 'sentence'.
Alignment failed: Unable to align text with audio timestamps.
Duration mismatch: Transcription length doesn't match audio segment duration.
usage: Provide transcription_text, audio_segment_id, and segment_start_time. Configure alignment_precision and force_alignment as needed. Returns word-level timestamps for synchronized text display.

aligned_words.description: List of words with their aligned timestamps

average_word_duration_ms.description: Average duration per word in milliseconds
